channel.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]RebornRS[/size][/b] [i][size=8pt]Because Jagex didn't[/size][/i]
[b]Introduction[/b] This isn't going to be a economy based server like you see alot of people tend to archive. It's going to be PK based 2005 pking server. I'm creating it with an old friend known under the name karhutkumoon, or Alexandre. We've already had it running once but with a different base, this time we're using Shard Revolution. And our main focus is to recreate what was the best. When we ran it the first time we had about 2 RuneScape clans playing.
[b][Helix-World2] Ewhenn - Mb Pk vid 1[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=to1FrRUOnjs&feature=player_embedded
[b]Media[/b] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/28sld76.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/iy2d1y.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/15fgirk.png[/img]

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:22, topic:395852”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=493039.msg3605344#msg3605344 date=1306050392]Maybe they have ‘better’ graphics in your opinion…

@if Jagex never moved on from this revision, there wouldn’t be such things as private servers - How come? I’m pretty sure they decompiled the 317 client…?
[/quote]

^ I agree with all of this. :)[/quote]

Understandable.

Read full topic

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:17, topic:395852”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=493039.msg3604976#msg3604976 date=1306015788]

Did you decide to switch around rsreborn or something lol?

Nah, me and a few mates was thinking of a name yesterday, and this popped up.

Also preview of combat: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8H4zwj3OniQ&feature=channel_video_title

looks okay dds is pretty glitchy?

“glitchy” explain please.

maybe it was the lagg of the vid, but the timers looked off and i think i saw him hit a 38 with one of the dds hits lol
[/quote]

Back in 2005 the dds double hits didn’t hit at the same time, they were one ‘tick’ after another. Also, it’s perfectly possible to hit 38 with a dds.[/quote]

I wish there was a thank button.

Andrew Ferguson:

Not to be that guy, but if Jagex never moved on from this revision, there wouldn’t be such things as private servers and the game would have gotten old by now. Don’t hate on them because they learned how to code some better graphics lol.

Maybe they have ‘better’ graphics in your opinion…

@if Jagex never moved on from this revision, there wouldn’t be such things as private servers - How come? I’m pretty sure they decompiled the 317 client…?

Read full topic
item.source: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Not to be that guy, but if Jagex never moved on from this revision, there wouldn’t be such things as private servers and the game would have gotten old by now. Don’t hate on them because they learned how to code some better graphics lol.

Should have a choice to use the old graphics for those die-hard RuneScapers who prefer the old ones like me imo.

Probly get more money out of it, eh.

Read full topic

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:13, topic:395852”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=493039.msg3604949#msg3604949 date=1306013634]

Did you decide to switch around rsreborn or something lol?

Nah, me and a few mates was thinking of a name yesterday, and this popped up.

Also preview of combat: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8H4zwj3OniQ&feature=channel_video_title

looks okay dds is pretty glitchy?

“glitchy” explain please.
[/quote]
maybe it was the lagg of the vid, but the timers looked off and i think i saw him hit a 38 with one of the dds hits lol[/quote]

That’s not the DDs that’s glitched. It’s the maxhit formula.

Uncalled:

Alright; not enough description or graphics to tell whether or not it’s actually good. Unless all that you’ve done is player combat, then so far you’re doing great.

The whole server is based of player combat.

Read full topic

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“TimeTM, post:6, topic:395852”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=493039.msg3604589#msg3604589 date=1305979791]

A fucking Pking video?
You damn newfag.

You’re taking stupidity to a whole new level.

You reversed an already existing name and used a sub-par base… Don’t really see this going anywhere, but good-luck.

Don’t mistake my bitchiness for hate, I’m just tired. <3

I don’t see any domain bought for it, therefore it’s not taken.

@Don’t really see this going anywhere - The first time we hosted this we hosted it for 2 days and reached a player amount of 150 and two real runescape clan’s pking. Well outdated ones.

Just because a domain name for something isn’t taken doesn’t mean the name itself isn’t taken, lol.
[/quote]

Just because your intention is to name your server something doesn’t it mean it’s copyrighted.[/quote]

I never said it was. Said the name’s simply in use, and you just reversed it.

Read full topic

item.title: RebornRS - The revision Jagex shouldn't of had moved from
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[size=14pt]RebornRS[/size]
[size=8pt]Because Jagex didn’t[/size]

Introduction
This isn’t going to be a economy based server like you see alot of people tend to archive. It’s going to be PK based 2005 pking server. I’m creating it with an old friend known under the name karhutkumoon, or Alexandre. We’ve already had it running once but with a different base, this time we’re using Shard Revolution. And our main focus is to recreate what was the best. When we ran it the first time we had about 2 RuneScape clans playing.

[Helix-World2] Ewhenn - Mb Pk vid 1

Media

28sld76.png758×492

15fgirk.png756×490

Read full topic
